Name: Orange Trews
Description: A pair of dashing orange trews that resembles a phoenix rising from the ashes.

Name: Orange Chausses
Description: Finely crafted chausses adorned with intricate embroideries, granting the wearer added defense.

Name: Orange Breeches
Description: Elegant orange breeches made of luxurious fabric, bringing comfort and style to the wearer.

Name: Orange Pluderhose
Description: Resilient orange pluderhose designed to aid fighters in combat, increasing their attack capabilities.

Name: Orange Hose
Description: Tailored orange hose suitable for knights, offering flexibility and easy movement.

Name: Orange Culottes
Description: Durable orange culottes, enhancing the wearer's endurance in both battle and travel.

Name: Orange Trunkhose
Description: Elegant orange trunkhose that portrays the grace of courtly dances.

Name: Orange Shorts
Description: A comfortable pair of orange shorts ideal for warm climates and casual wear.

Name: Orange Gown
Description: A stunning orange gown, exuding an air of nobility and elegance.

Name: Orange Surcoat
Description: A flowing orange surcoat that provides the wearer with enchanted defense against magical attacks.

Name: Orange Kirtle
Description: A beautifully crafted orange kirtle, fit for a regal presence at court festivities.

Name: Orange Hennin
Description: An ornate orange hennin boasting magical properties, enhancing the wearer's magical attack.

Name: Orange Brigandine
Description: A durable orange brigandine, supporting the wearer's vitality with added health benefits.

Name: Orange Hauberk
Description: A legendary orange hauberk, symbolizing the chivalry and dedication of its wearer.

Name: Orange Cotehardie
Description: An exquisite orange cotehardie that aids its wearer in evading incoming attacks with ease.

Name: Orange Chainmail
Description: A robust orange chainmail that bestows its wearer with an astonishing boost to their action points.

Name: Orange Plate Armor
Description: A heavy orange plate armor offering unwavering defense and fortification for its wearer.

Name: Orange Scale Armor
Description: Versatile orange scale armor that provides a perfect balance of protection and agility.

Name: Orange Lamellar Armor
Description: A suit of orange lamellar armor, enhancing the wearer's endurance in battle and strenuous activities.

Name: Orange Cuirass
Description: A heavily reinforced orange cuirass, providing the ultimate defense for any warrior.

Name: Orange Gambeson
Description: A robust orange gambeson providing exceptional protection and increasing the wearer's maximum health.
